mapper.select: SELECT cd_master_m.CATEGORY_CODE,cd_master_m.`CODE`,cd_master_m.DELETE_FLAG, cd_master_m.DESCRIPTION, cd_master_m.DISPLAY_ORDER, cd_master_m.INS_TIMESTAMP, cd_master_m.INS_USER_ID, cd_master_m.`NAME`, cd_master_m.UPD_TIMESTAMP,cd_master_m.UPD_USER_ID FROM cd_master_m where CATEGORY_CODE = #{ccode}
